product_name: Serfas Thunderbolt USB Rear Bike Light
long_description: The Serfas Thunderbolt USB rechargeable rear bike light lets you alert others to your presence, thanks to its bright strip of micro LEDs. The strip of 30 red micro-LED bulbs puts out up to 35 lumens of light; strip design puts out a nondirectional flood of light for wide coverage area. Water-resistant, flexible and finish-friendly silicone body and adjustable straps stretch around your bike's frame for easy, tool-free mounting and removal. 4 modes (with run times): high beam/constant (1.75 hrs.), low beam/constant (7 hrs.), high flash (3 hrs.), low flash (9.5 hrs.). USB rechargeable design of the Serfas Thunderbolt rear bike light lets you recharge the light via a USB port; recharges in 2 hrs.
short_description: The Serfas Thunderbolt USB rechargeable rear bike light lets you alert others to your presence, thanks to its bright strip of micro LEDs.
